subject: Re: [junit] parallel test directories and eclipse
msgSnippet: I have had trouble with Eclipse reporting the same class n times in Go to type when I ve had multiple source trees. I gave up on it. So said  Bill de hÓra
messageBody:
I have had trouble with Eclipse reporting the same class 'n' times in
"Go to type" when I've had multiple source trees. I gave up on it.

So said Bill de hÓra on 2002-11-13

>Hi,
>
>Has anyone had any success getting Eclipse to understand a project
>whose junit code is organized as follows:
>
> src/
> java/
> a/b/c
> test/
> a/b/c
>
>I imagine it can be done, but I've not been able to get Eclipse to
>shut up - it says it can't find src/test's dependencies, ie the ones
>in src/java
>
>Bill de hÓra
>
>
>
>To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
>junit-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
>
>
